name: Bruno Bichir
biography:
From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia.

Bruno Bichir (born Bruno Bichir N치jera October 6, 1967, Mexico City) is one of the most prolific actors of the contemporary cinema of Mexico as well as telenovelas and theater.

Bruno is a member of the Bichir family of Lebanese origin whose members are prominent actors. Both of his parents, Alejandro Bichir and Maricruz N치jera, and two older brothers Odiseo and Demi치n Bichir are actors.
